mapper.insert: insert into recipe (recipe_id, name, serveamount, preparationTime, cookingTime, image_url) values (#{recipe.recipeId}, #{recipeName}, #{serveAmount}, #{preparationTime}, #{cookingTime}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: select recipe_id as recipeId, name as recipeName, serveamount as serveAmount, preparationTime, cookingTime, image_url as imageUrl from recipe
select recipe_id as recipeId, name as recipeName, serveamount as serveAmount, preparationTime, cookingTime,image_url as imageUrl from recipe where name like concat('%', #{recipeName}, '%')
